ygData.msgSnippet: Right now i use a crystalline blade in primary slot and silvery war axe in secondary.  in the bank is a dragoon dirk, demon claws, and staff of writhing.  on
ygData.messageBody:
Right now i use a crystalline blade in primary slot and silvery war axe in
secondary. in the bank is a dragoon dirk, demon claws, and staff of
writhing. on my wish list is a short sword of the ykesha, but i keep going
and losing the lotto as usual. would love a wakizishi but never get anyone
to camp for the quest items. sorry to whine hehehe.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 12 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


>im curious to find out what weapons everyone (20+)
> enjoys using.
> Im a parttime business man dabbling in armour sales, but im a weapons
> collector for fun. my personal stash includes demon claw,
> staff of writhing,
> black enammelled mace, dragoon dirk, obsidian shard, lj
> crook. had to give
> up my tommys awhile back.
>
> learic lovejam
> 26 15/16 bardsman of Xegony
>
>
